channel.title: Need help coding a server
channel.description:
Hey everyone, recently I have gotten into the field of coding private servers and I have been trying to put together a server like a popular one but I am having problems coding, there are some minor bugs/glitches with my source and I cannot for the life of me figure out how to fix them, I am looking for a coder that knows what he/she is doing. Please only serious and professional people only, I don't want to waste my time on someone that doesn't know how to code.
Thanks, Blue Mar1ne.

item.title: Need help coding a server
item.dc:creator: @Blue_Mar1ne Blue Mar1ne
item.description:
@Blue_Mar1ne wrote:

Lordabyssal:

Ok i am willing to help for parts i now off. So what can i help you with?

Well I will PM you might skype and we can talk further there.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help coding a server
item.dc:creator: @Blue_Mar1ne Blue Mar1ne
item.description:
@Blue_Mar1ne wrote:

Lordabyssal:

I now about 65% of PI and 317 sources what do you need? What base are you using?

Well, to give more information I am pretty sure it is a delta and it is a 317 or around that revision.
I need to make some bug fixes and add some features, like commands and donor systems and fix some items
like limes and just general things.
